assessment_item.title: AKSTL4 Q9.Which of the following statements is not true?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Which of the following statements is not true?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Adjusted purchases account will be shown on the debit side of the trading account.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1185"},{"text":"

Income in received in advance appearing in trial balance will be shown in the liabilities side of the balance sheet.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1186"},{"text":"

Interest on capital contributed by a sole proprietor is a business expense.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1196"},{"text":"

Outstanding expenses refer to any expense in the current accounting period, the benefit of which will be received in the next accounting period.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1201"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"AKSTL4 Q9.Which of the following statements is not true?","title":"AKSTL4 Q9.Which of the following statements is not true?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"English","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Accountancy Volume 2","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
